DOC.brief_title: Swabbing Subcutaneous Tissues Cesarean Section Wounds With Povidone Iodine
DOC.detailed_description: Aim study : To assess efficacy subcutaneous swab cesarean section wound povidone iodine prevent postoperative wound infection . Study Design : Randomized controlled trial . Subjects : Women cesarean delivery . The woman full description study Subjects randomize select sequentially number seal envelope one group open closure rectus sheath . Method : - Patient receive single dose prophylactic antibiotic ( 2-grams first generation cephalosporin ) intravenous time cesarean delivery induction anesthesia . -The type suture material ; vicryl No1 use rectus Sheath repair group . - The type suture material use suture subcutaneous tissue skin ( vicryl NO 2/0 ) . Follow : Women group follow hospital stay outpatient clinic visit week month cesarean delivery surgical site complication evaluate researcher . Outcome : The study outcome detect record incidence surgical wound infection groups.It composite outcome presence follow consider infection : - Induration - Swelling wound edge - Discharge pu wind dehiscence . - Purulent drainage without laboratory confirmation , superficial incision - Pain tenderness redness , heat - Superficial incision deliberately open surgeon . Sample size estimation : It calculate 269 patient require arm detect 5 % reduction ( 7 % 2 % ) cesarean section wound infection rate study control group . Statistical Analysis : Data tabulate use Statistical Package Social Scientists ( SPSS ) program statistical analysis carry suitable statistical test . Continuous variable present mean standard deviation , compare use Student-t-test . Dichotomous variable compare use Chi square cut point P-value le 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: All woman either first time repeat cesarean section whether elective emergency . Women prolong rupture membrane 12 hour . Women morbid obesity BMI > 35 . Women diabetes , hypertension anemia hemoglobin < 9 . Women corticosteroid therapy immunosuppressed woman . Women intraoperative hemorrhage hematoma formation . Women allergic betadine . The cesarean section duration exceed one hour associate surgical procedure .
